translation.en: [girl] Okay, class, today's song is "The Clapping Song" by Shirley Ellis.
translation.zh: 好的 同学们 今天的歌是雪利·埃利斯的《拍手歌》

translation.en: When you sing, I want to hear every word clearly and succinctly.
translation.zh: 你们唱的时候我希望听清楚每句歌词

translation.en: [Yumi] Can you sing it first, Amber?
After we see how you do it, we sing much better.
translation.zh: 看了你怎么唱 我们能唱得更好

translation.en: [Amber] Okay, okay. Um, but just the first verse.
translation.zh: 好吧 好吧 但只唱第一段

translation.en: [Amber] Thank you, thank you. Okay. Is everyone ready?
translation.zh: -谢谢 好的 大家准备好了吗？-好了

translation.en: [clears throat] Now, what do we have to remember, my Divas?
translation.zh: 现在 我们必须记住什么我的天后们？
没错 开始吧 齐神父

translation.en: The biggest claps you could give me.
translation.zh: 你们能给我的最大掌声

translation.en: Father Chee. I need soul claps. Come on.
translation.zh: 齐神父 我需要灵魂鼓掌 快点

translation.en: All right, are you ready for this verse?
translation.zh: 好的 准备好唱这一段了吗？

translation.en: I need to hear every single word as clear as you can!
translation.zh: 我需要听你们尽可能地唱清楚每个词

translation.en: And then I need soul claps too.
translation.zh: 然后我也需要灵魂鼓掌
（随你付多少英语作为第二语言学习班）

translation.en: Thank you. Have a good night.

translation.zh: （根据马修·奎克的小说《神似摇滚明星》改编）

translation.en: Are you still hungry, Bobby Big Boy?
-[Mom] Hi, baby. -You're late. Where have you been?
translation.zh: -嗨 宝贝-你迟到了 你去哪里了？

translation.en: I know, I know. But I brought you something.
translation.zh: 我知道 但我给你带了东西

translation.en: Who says dessert can't be dinner?
translation.zh: 谁说餐后甜点不能当晚饭？

translation.en: You telling me nutritionists don’t like cheesecake?
translation.zh: 你是在跟我说营养学家不喜欢起司蛋糕？

translation.en: This is from the Copper Kettle.
Did you sit at the bar?
I had one glass of wine.
-Just one. -You're not supposed to have any.
But it was-- It was just one.
So Oliver’s back in the picture now?
No! No, not really. This just-- This is a way to get us some dinner.
translation.zh: 不 不是的 就是…这是给我们搞点晚饭的方法

translation.en: You were supposed to look at apartments, not get cheesecake from Oliver.
translation.zh: 你应该去找公寓而不是从奥利弗那里拿起司蛋糕

translation.en: Well, that's all that he could give me, so I took it,
translation.zh: 他能给我的只有这个 所以我就拿了

translation.en: and I'm sorry that it's not good enough for you.
translation.zh: 对不起 对你来说不够好

translation.en: Oh, it's really good, Mom, actually.
translation.zh: 哦 实际上真的很好吃 妈妈

translation.en: -No. I don't want any. -Have some. Don't be mad.
translation.zh: -不 我不想吃-吃一点 别生气

translation.en: -Just a little bite. I promise. -I'm not mad.
translation.zh: -就一小口 我保证-我没生气

translation.en: It's the best cheesecake I've ever had and you're saying no.
translation.zh: 这是我吃过最好吃的起司蛋糕你却不肯吃
哦 看见了吧？我告诉过你的

translation.en: And sings the tune without the words,
translation.zh: 吟唱着没有歌词的语调

translation.en: And sweetest in the gale is heard;
translation.zh: 狂风中听到觉得最为甜美

translation.en: And sore must be the storm
That could abash the little bird

translation.zh: 它却给我们留下很多温暖

translation.en: I've heard it in the chillest land,
translation.zh: 我听到它了 在最寒冷的土地上

translation.en: It asked a crumb of me."
Some storm we're in, huh, baby?
translation.zh: 我们就身处暴风雨中 是吗 宝贝？

translation.en: -[mock scoff] Way to aim low, Mom. -[chuckles]

translation.zh: 我们…我们的人生会很精彩
克里斯滕 约翰 早上好

translation.en: Would you like a donut today?
Hey, Mr. Linder. It's me, Amber.
translation.zh: 嘿 林德先生 是我 安珀

translation.en: No, I work here on the weekends,
translation.zh: 没有 我周末在这里工作

translation.en: but I had some donuts, so I thought I'd stop by.
translation.zh: 但我有一些甜甜圈所以我觉得应该顺路过来

translation.en: Careful, it's a category three in there today.
translation.zh: 小心 今天脾气指数是三级
哦 我也觉得是你 走开

translation.en: Has anyone ever told you that you are loud?
translation.zh: 没人告诉过你你很吵吗？

translation.en: -"Good" is a matter of opinion. -Well, here's a fact:
Rainbow sprinkled donut? The best donut, and I saved it for you.
translation.zh: 彩虹糖甜甜圈？最好的甜甜圈 我帮你留了一个

translation.en: Some, uh, soothing entertainment to start your morning?
translation.zh: 你大清早就进行这种舒缓的娱乐活动？

translation.en: Right. Uh, could I use your shower? Our water heater's still on the fritz.
translation.zh: 好 我能用你的淋浴间吗？我们的热水器还是坏的

translation.en: You know, when I was your age, we didn't have hot showers.
translation.zh: 我在你这个年纪我们根本没条件洗热水澡

translation.en: Ooh. You wanna hear a joke?
translation.zh: 哦 你想听个笑话吗？

translation.en: You're gonna laugh this time. Ready?
translation.zh: 你这次会笑的 准备好了吗？

translation.en: What do you call a fish with no eyes?
Careful, Joan. One of these days, I will make you laugh.
translation.zh: 小心 琼恩 总有一天我会让你笑的

translation.en: Not if I make you cry first.
translation.zh: 如果我没有让你先哭的话

translation.en: You couldn't make me cry if you tried.
translation.zh: 就算你想 你也不能把我弄哭
瑞奇 早上好 早饭

translation.en: Ricky! Come on, dude, we have school!
translation.zh: 瑞奇 快点 兄弟 我们要上学

translation.en: You're waking me up a minute earlier every day.
translation.zh: 你每天都让我比前一天早起一分钟

translation.en: You're on to me. The master plan is to eventually wake you up at 4:00 a.m.
translation.zh: 被你看穿了总体规划是最终让你在凌晨4点起床

translation.en: Before I even go to sleep!
Which would totally suck, but might be sort of cool,
translation.zh: 那样会很糟糕 但也许也有点酷

translation.en: because then we could eat breakfast together and stay up all night.
translation.zh: 因为我们可以一起吃早饭然后嗨翻整晚
-嘿 你们两个-嘿 妈妈

translation.en: The night shift. It's, uh... life's rich pageant.
translation.zh: 夜班 就是…人生真精彩

translation.en: You left this on the counter.
translation.zh: 你把这个落在台子上了
-再见 妈妈-再见 宝贝
祝你有美好的一天 安珀
亨德里克斯？福克斯和福克斯

translation.en: Hey, Jordan, is that a coloring book?
translation.zh: 嘿 乔丹 这本是画册吗？

translation.en: Because there are Marquez all over the pages.
translation.zh: 因为“马尔克斯”是发明马克笔的那个人

translation.en: We've had 31 days of school, that's 31 rides.
translation.zh: 我们上了31天的学那就是31次拼车出行

translation.en: Thirty-one sandwiches, too, am I right?
translation.zh: 也是31个三明治 我说得对吗？

translation.en: -So many sandwiches. -Okay, seriously, Ty deserves a sandwich
translation.zh: -好多三明治-对 说真的 泰值得得到三明治奖励

translation.en: because he has to leave the house way earlier than the rest of us.
translation.zh: 因为他要比我们提早离开家

translation.en: -And I'm the only one who owns a car. -That's true.
translation.zh: -而且我是唯一有车的人-没错

translation.en: -A car? Okay. Well, this... Not a car. -Technically, I don't think you own it.
translation.zh: -车？这辆根本不是车-实际上我觉得这不是你的车

translation.en: He's the only one with access to a car.
translation.zh: 他是唯一一个有车开的人

translation.en: -Yes, thank you. Access. -[Jordan] Call it a vehicle.
translation.zh: -对 谢谢 有车开-叫它交通工具吧

translation.en: I still fail to see how any of this warrants a sandwich.
translation.zh: 我还是没看出来这有什么值得奖励三明治的

translation.en: I think Amber's got a crush on Ty. That's why she makes him a sandwich.
translation.zh: 我觉得安珀喜欢泰所以她要为他做三明治

translation.en: Do you guys realize the marching band's been playing all year without a tuba?
translation.zh: 你们察觉到没有  仪乐队在没有大号的情况下表演了一整年？

translation.en: Somebody stole it over the summer.
translation.zh: 夏天的时候大号被人偷了

translation.en: Yeah, look at Ryan Gold. She looks weird.
translation.zh: 对 看看莱恩·高德 她看起来怪怪的

translation.en: They’ve played half the football season without it.
translation.zh: 半个橄榄球赛季他们没有大号就这么表演

translation.en: Now that state championships are coming up, if they don’t have a tuba,
translation.zh: 马上要进行州锦标赛了如果他们没有大号

translation.en: -they’re automatically disqualified. -Okay, but who steals a tuba?
translation.zh: 会被自动淘汰 好吧 但谁偷了大号？

translation.en: Someone who’s really horny for it.

translation.zh: 它真正的名字其实是苏萨大号

translation.en: You could get a lot of cash for one on the dark web.
translation.zh: 拿到暗网上可以卖很多钱

translation.en: Why don't they get another one? Borrow it or rent it, I don't know.
translation.zh: 为什么他们不去另搞一个？借一个或租一个 我不知道

translation.en: Sure, Ty. Why don’t you just lend Ryan your extra tuba?
translation.zh: 当然 泰 你为什么不把你多余的大号借给莱恩？
-苏萨大号-没人为此挺身而出

translation.en: About three, four grand should do it for a proper marching model.
translation.zh: 仪乐队用的款式差不多要三四千块钱

translation.en: Is she on the dark web right now?
I say we make the tuba this year’s cause for the Variety Show.
translation.zh: 要我说 我们把大号作为今年《综艺秀》的筹款主题

translation.en: Amber runs the Variety Show. She started it.
translation.zh: 安珀负责《综艺秀》 她已经开始了

translation.en: But how do we get people excited over a tuba?
translation.zh: 但我们怎么让大家对大号感兴趣？
哦 天哪 说了是苏萨大号

translation.en: I don't know, but we have to. Just look at Ryan.
translation.zh: 我不知道但我们必须做到 就看看莱恩

translation.en: Leah is awesome. You know, she's auditioning for Oklahoma! this year?
translation.zh: 莉娅很棒 你知道她今年参加了《俄克拉何马》的试镜吗？

translation.en: -You know where this is going, Ty. -Yeah, I do.
translation.zh: -你知道最后会讨论什么 泰-对 我知道

translation.en: Come on! Mr. Franks thinks you'd make a great Curly. We all do.
translation.zh: 别这样 弗兰克斯老师觉得你扮演的科里非常棒 我们都这么觉得

translation.en: -We need you this year. -I don't know.
Getting on stage in front of all those people, it's terrifying.
translation.zh: 站在舞台上面对众人 太吓人了

translation.en: You play soccer in front of all those people.
translation.zh: 你都能在众人面前踢足球

translation.en: Yeah, but I don't have to bust out with a show tune. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 对 但我不用在众人面前用流行唱法高歌

translation.en: I think you'd look great in a cowboy hat.
translation.zh: 我觉得你戴牛仔帽很帅

translation.en: I've been trying to text you, but I keep on getting delivery failure.
translation.zh: 我一直想发信息给你但老是发送失败

translation.en: Yeah. Uh, that's a whole thing.
translation.zh: 对 这个事情有点复杂

translation.en: I lost my phone, and I haven't had a chance to get a new one yet.
translation.zh: 我手机丢了 但我还没机会买新的

translation.en: I was hoping we could have, like...
Cell phones aren't private. It's much better to stay off-grid.
translation.zh: 手机可不私密 最好线下交流

translation.en: Plus, I'm the only teenager in all of America who doesn't have a cell phone.
translation.zh: 再说了 我是全美国唯一没有手机的青少年

translation.en: [Ty] So, it--it takes place in, um, I'm assuming Oklahoma.
translation.zh: 所以它发生在 我想是俄克拉荷马

translation.en: That's why we're trying to bring you in.
translation.zh: 那就是我们想让你加入的原因

translation.en: -All right, you got it. -That whole dynamic going on...
translation.zh: -好的 没问题-整个节奏继续…
-嘿 弗兰克斯老师-弗兰克斯
我喜欢你的衬衫 弗兰克斯老师

translation.en: That's very nice of you. Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 你这么说很好 非常感谢

translation.en: Yeah, what's, uh, going on over there?
translation.zh: 嗯 衬衫上是什么图案？

translation.en: You know, it's just sort of some outdoor tableaus.
You know, some people listening to music, and sitting on a park bench.
translation.zh: 一些人听音乐 坐在公园长凳上

translation.en: -Trees, and tennis, and... -[Jordan] It's stylish. I like it.
translation.zh: -树木和网球 还有…-很时髦 我喜欢

translation.en: [Ty] I like it. Do one of 'em have a-- One has a mullet.
translation.zh: 我也喜欢 他们中是不是有人…有人拿了一条乌鱼

translation.en: -It's very '80s. I like that. -[Chad] Yeah, it's very you. We approve.
translation.zh: -非常的80年代 我喜欢-对 跟你很配 我们都同意
-弗兰克斯-不一定是80年代 但是…
-哦 也许是的-弗兰克斯老师？
（我想邀请你参加表演/音乐剧院项目的试镜）

translation.en: You're being asked to audition at Carnegie Mellon.
translation.zh: 卡内基梅隆大学邀请你试镜
-安珀要去匹茨堡了 快看-什么？
这是你的梦想 安珀
难以置信 我的天哪

translation.en: [Chad] What song are you going to sing?
[Ricky] Pittsburgh? How are you going to get to Pittsburgh?
translation.zh: 匹茨堡？你打算怎么去匹茨堡？

translation.en: I was so tired, I just fell asleep.
translation.zh: 我太累了 我就睡着了

translation.en: He's asked us to move in.
And I think we should do it.
And it is getting cold outside.
I'd rather freeze my ass off on a bus than go back to Oliver's.
translation.zh: 比起去奥利弗家我宁愿在巴士里冻死

translation.en: and we still don't have enough money for an apartment.
What if we tried the shelter again?
translation.zh: 如果我们再去避难所试试呢？

translation.en: No, I'm not going to the shelter. No.
translation.zh: 不 我不去避难所 不去

translation.en: So that I can have people questioning my parenting?
translation.zh: 这样别人就可以质疑我怎么带小孩吗？

translation.en: No one can find out about us. You understand?
translation.zh: 不能让别人发现我们的事你明白吗？

translation.en: Because if they do, I'll lose you.
translation.zh: 因为如果他们发现了 我会失去你

translation.en: Let's just talk about this when you're in a better mood.
translation.zh: 等你情绪好一点 我们再谈吧

translation.en: I got invited to audition for Carnegie Mellon.
translation.zh: 卡内基梅隆大学邀请我去试镜

translation.en: Your dad would be so proud.
translation.zh: 你爸爸会为你感到自豪的

translation.en: How does it work? You sing for them?
translation.zh: 流程是怎么样的？你为他们歌唱吗？

translation.en: Yeah. And then they crush my dreams.
translation.zh: 对 然后他们碾碎我的梦想

translation.en: They won't. You're gonna be great.
translation.zh: 他们不会的 你会很棒的

translation.en: How am I even gonna get to Pittsburgh?

translation.zh: 你一直在存钱 是吗？

translation.en: Yeah, for an apartment, not some stupid audition.
translation.zh: 对 用来租公寓 不是某些愚蠢的试镜

translation.en: You're not yappin' all over the game like you usually do.
translation.zh: 你不像往常那样在下棋时大喊大叫了
没什么 我只是在思考
泰是朋友 我们是兄弟

translation.en: Have you hooked up with him yet?
Get over it, and quit wasting your time thinking.
translation.zh: 看开点 别浪费时间去想了

translation.en: Youth is precious, so you should enjoy it.
translation.zh: 青春是宝贵的 你应该去享受

translation.en: That's the most positive thing I think I've ever heard you say.
translation.zh: 这是我听你说过的最积极的话

translation.en: Well, it's just another way of saying that life is nasty, brutish, and short.
translation.zh: 这只是生活是肮脏、野蛮、短暂的另一种说法而已
好的 瑞奇 说鸡蛋的双关

translation.en: Well, I only know a few, so this will be over easy.
translation.zh: 我只知道一点所以是双面煎鸡蛋

translation.en: Omelet you use that one if you want.
translation.zh: 你想的话可以用荷包蛋
对 很好笑 因为…

translation.en: I usually only eat eggs around hollandaise.
translation.zh: 通常我吃鸡蛋都要裹荷兰酱
-早上好 宝贝-早上好 妈妈
-嘿-抱歉 我们把你吵醒了？
没有 我已经起来了

translation.en: Can I talk to you for a minute?
I noticed you've been using my makeup.
translation.zh: 我注意到你一直在用我的化妆品
哦 唐娜 非常对不起

translation.en: It's okay. I used to dip into my sister's makeup all the time,
translation.zh: 没关系我过去经常用我姐姐的化妆品

translation.en: but it's kind of gross. So...
What do you mean? Sure you can.
No, I just-- I don't wear makeup.
translation.zh: 不 我就是…我不搽化妆品

translation.en: I was practicing. I'm really sorry.
translation.zh: 我就是在练习 真的很对不起

translation.en: I know, and it's really great. I just--
translation.zh: 我知道 真的很棒 我就是…
嗯 我很好 好的不能再好了
诗歌 很好 谢谢

translation.en: The tuba's a great cause, and I know you'd shine up there.
translation.zh: 大号是个很好的主题我知道你在台上的表演会很棒

translation.en: I don't have any real skills, Amber.
translation.zh: 我没有什么真正的技能 安珀

translation.en: Sure, you do. When you close your eyes, what do you imagine yourself doing?
translation.zh: 你当然有 当你闭上双眼你想象自己在做什么？

translation.en: Tommy, you're going to kill it.
translation.zh: 汤米 你会大放异彩的

translation.en: But what if I eat it?
-Awesome, can't wait to hear it. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -太棒了 等不及听了-谢谢

translation.en: Okay. So, Ricky's gonna do a pun-off.
translation.zh: 好的 那么瑞奇要表演双关语

translation.en: -Put me down as Lingo Starr. -I love it.
Chad, you're going to wow us with some thespianism, right?
translation.zh: 查德 你要用演技让我们惊叹 对吗？
-这就是计划-太棒了 泰呢？

translation.en: Uh, I thought I'd stage manage. Help out with the behind-the-scenes stuff.
translation.zh: 我以为我负责舞台管理帮助做一些幕后的事情

translation.en: Come on! You've gotta do something up there. You're so talented.
translation.zh: 别这样 你要到前台来 你很有天赋

translation.en: He’s only good at soccer as far as we know.
translation.zh: 据我们所知 他就擅长踢足球

translation.en: Exactly! And this is your chance to show everyone
translation.zh: 没错 这是你向大家展示的机会

translation.en: how very talented you are, and also charismatic.
translation.zh: 你多么有天赋 还有多么的有魅力
所以考虑一下 拜托？

translation.en: -Okay, yeah, I'll think about it. -Yes! All right.
I'll be performing an Argentine tango.
I can finally tell you my sister watches a little too much Dancing with the Stars.
translation.zh: 我终于可以告诉你们我妹妹看了太多的《与星共舞》

translation.en: A, That is a lie. B, please put me down for an Argentine tango.
translation.zh: 首先 那是谎言其次 帮我把阿根廷探戈报上去

translation.en: You do realize it takes two human beings to tango, right?
translation.zh: 你绝对意识到了探戈要两个人跳 对吗？

translation.en: Put me down as “Jordan and TBD.”
translation.zh: 节目单上把我写成“乔丹 待定”
好的 弗兰克斯老师？

translation.en: Me? No. This is for you guys. I'm not gonna get involved.
translation.zh: 我？不 这是你们的活动 我不参与

translation.en: -What? Are you kidding? -Come on, man. Really?
translation.zh: -什么？你开玩笑吗？-等等 别这样 真的吗？

translation.en: -You have to help us out. -[Ricky] Do it.
translation.zh: 你必须帮我们 -来吧-怎样都行

translation.en: All right. I'll think of something. "All the world's a stage.
translation.zh: 好的 我会考虑的 “世界是个舞台

translation.en: Right? Is that what it is? I don't know. I have work to do, guys.
translation.zh: 对吗？是这样吗？ 我不知道我有工作要做 各位

translation.en: Okay, you know the school can help foot the bill for this.
translation.zh: 好的 你知道学校可以帮你付这笔钱

translation.en: There's this discretionary fund for students in need.
translation.zh: 有一笔可自由支配的基金为有需要的学生准备

translation.en: Okay, but I'm not in need. I am flush.
translation.zh: 好的 但我不需要 我有很多钱

translation.en: All right. One ticket to Pittsburgh, coming right up.
translation.zh: 好的 一张去匹茨堡的票马上就来

translation.en: Carnegie Mellon will not know what hit them.
translation.zh: 卡内基梅隆大学不会知道有人要让他们动心了

translation.en: I got fired. I had two drinks. I'm not drunk.
translation.zh: 我被解雇了 我喝了两杯 我没醉

translation.en: It doesn't matter. They found out.
translation.zh: 无所谓了 他们发现了

translation.en: Oliver's coming to pick us up.
I had my money in there.
I don't know what to do, Ty.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么办 泰

translation.en: My mom's gonna be looking for me,
and I can't go back to Oliver's.
translation.zh: 我不能回奥利弗那里去
我们好好想想 好吗？

translation.en: We don't have school on Monday.
[Ty] It’s a really important audition, Mom.
translation.zh: 这真的是很重要的试镜 妈妈

translation.en: I thought the peace and quiet would do Amber a lot of good.
translation.zh: 我觉得安静的环境会给安珀带来很多好处

translation.en: Plus, we've got such a good piano up here,
translation.zh: 再说了 我们这儿有一架很好的钢琴

translation.en: I don't see why we wouldn't use it.
translation.zh: 我不明白为什么我们不用

translation.en: No, I get that. I'm sorry. You're right. I should have told you.
translation.zh: 不 我明白了 对不起你是对的 我应该提前告诉你
她只是一位朋友 妈妈

translation.en: Nobody's going to be partying up here, we're gonna be practicing.
translation.zh: 没人会在这里开派对 我们只会排练

translation.en: Runs in the family, I guess.
translation.zh: 我想也是家中的顶梁柱

translation.en: All right, ready when you are.
translation.zh: 好的 准备好就开始

translation.en: ♪ I didn’t know it But my life had changed ♪
translation.zh: 我不知道 但我的生活已经改变

translation.en: ♪ And all I saw was you ♪

translation.zh: 你像火一样燃烧发出亮光

translation.en: ♪ Oh, what I saw in you ♪

translation.zh: 带我走 我准备好了
慢慢地 但坚定前行

translation.en: ♪ To a place that we can call our own ♪
translation.zh: 去一个我们可以做自己的地方

translation.en: ♪ I wanna know what feels like home ♪

translation.zh: 带我走 我准备好了
慢慢地 但坚定前行

translation.en: ♪ To a place that we can call our own ♪
translation.zh: 去一个我们可以做自己的地方

translation.en: ♪ I wanna know what feels like home ♪

translation.zh: 带我走 我准备好了
慢慢地 但坚定前行

translation.en: ♪ To a place that we can call our own ♪
translation.zh: 去一个我们可以做自己的地方

translation.en: ♪ I wanna know what feels like home ♪
I'm sorry, but you have zero talent.
translation.zh: 抱歉 但你完全没有天赋

translation.en: That was embarrassing. I was embarrassed for you.
translation.zh: 真是难为情 我为你感到难为情

translation.en: He wrote that song for my mom.
translation.zh: 他为我妈妈写了这首歌

translation.en: Never even knew anything was wrong with it.
translation.zh: 甚至都不知道有什么问题

translation.en: My mom tried to keep it together.
translation.zh: 我妈妈想努力维持一个家

translation.en: She just didn't have any family around.
translation.zh: 她就是没有任何家人在身边了

translation.en: So little by little, things started to go downhill.
translation.zh: 所以慢慢地事情急转直下

translation.en: When we got evicted, we moved in with Oliver.
translation.zh: 被赶出来后 我们搬去和奥利弗住

translation.en: First night we got there, they went out drinking.
translation.zh: 我们到的第一晚 他们就出去喝酒

translation.en: She'd been sober for five months.
Then one night, he hit her.
translation.zh: 然后有一晚 他打了她

translation.en: We're going to figure something out, all right?
translation.zh: 我们想出解决办法的 好吗？

translation.en: Ricky's over at Chad and Jordan's practicing for the Variety Show.
translation.zh: 瑞奇去查德和乔丹家排练《综艺秀》去了

translation.en: Yeah, I actually came to see you.
translation.zh: 嗯 实际上我是来找你的

translation.en: I need to tell you something.
I don't understand what's going on here.
translation.zh: 我不明白 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: We just want to discuss some things with you, Becky.
translation.zh: 我们就是想跟你讨论一些事 贝琪

translation.en: Well, I, uh, came here to pick up my daughter,
because she was missing all weekend and I was worried sick,
translation.zh: 因为她整个周末都不见人影我担心死了

translation.en: and I don't really want to discuss anything with you.
translation.zh: 我真的不想和你讨论任何事

translation.en: What are you looking at her for?
Amber wants you to know she doesn't feel comfortable living at Oliver's.
translation.zh: 安珀想让你知道她不想住在奥利弗那里

translation.en: So you two talked about everything, huh?
translation.zh: 所以你们两个无话不谈吗？

translation.en: Well, it may not be comfortable, but that is where we live now.
translation.zh: 也许你是不想但现在那里就是我们住的地方

translation.en: I don't wanna live there again.
translation.zh: 我再也不想住在那里了

translation.en: You felt safer living on a bus?
translation.zh: 你觉得住在巴士里安全？

translation.en: I don't care what you think.
Donna says I can stay here for a few nights, until we figure this out.
translation.zh: 唐娜说我可以在这里住几晚直到我们想出办法
不 绝对不行 不
-这样很好 贝琪-不 不好

translation.en: Who-- Who do you think you are? Really?
translation.zh: 你以为自己是谁啊？真的吗？

translation.en: She is my daughter. She stays with me.
translation.zh: 她是我女儿 她和我住

translation.en: I'm not going anywhere with you until you move out of Oliver's.
translation.zh: 除非你搬出奥利弗的家否则我不会和你去任何地方

translation.en: If you keep her here, I'm calling the cops.
translation.zh: 如果你留她在这里 我就报警

translation.en: Well, maybe that's not a bad idea.
translation.zh: 也许报警不是个坏主意

translation.en: Maybe we all need to have a conversation about this.
translation.zh: 也许我们都需要谈谈这件事

translation.en: I'm the one that keeps things together.
translation.zh: 我是维系一切的那个人

translation.en: Really, Mom? You do that? I had no idea.
translation.zh: 真的吗 妈妈？你那么做了吗？我怎么不知道啊

translation.en: Can't you-- You can't see that I'm trying to take care of you?
translation.zh: 你就不能…你看不出我在努力照顾你吗？

translation.en: Well, your best isn't good enough.
Stay here for the rest of your life for all I care.
translation.zh: 你在这里度过余生吧管我什么事呢

translation.en: What am I supposed to do?
And we can get you help. We can start over.
translation.zh: 我们可以帮你 我们可以重新开始

translation.en: Life is so much more complicated than you think, baby.
translation.zh: 生活比你想象地要复杂的多 宝贝
你需要的东西都齐了吗？

translation.en: I'm really sorry for putting you in the middle of all this.
translation.zh: 我真的很抱歉把你牵扯进来

translation.en: You have nothing... nothing to be sorry about.
translation.zh: 你没什么…没什么好抱歉的

translation.en: Just... try to get some rest, okay?
translation.zh: 就是…好好休息一下 好吗？

translation.en: [teacher] The Executive Branch had three departments.
There was the Department of State,
which was led by Thomas Jefferson.
There was the Department of Treasury, -which was led by-- -[door opens]
[softly] Hey. I need to speak with Amber.
translation.zh: 嘿 我需要和安珀谈谈
安珀 带上你的东西

translation.en: Amber, this is Officer Rozick and Officer Garland.
translation.zh: 安珀 这两位是罗吉克和加兰德警官

translation.en: I know what this is about.

translation.zh: 我妈妈报警了 是吗？
安珀 你妈妈丽贝卡·艾伯顿

translation.en: was involved in an automobile accident early this morning.
We're sorry to have to tell you, but she died of her injuries
translation.zh: 我们非常遗憾地通知你她在送医过程中

translation.en: on the way to the hospital.
[Rozick] Amber, do you have any friends or relatives you can stay with tonight?
translation.zh: 安珀 你有没有亲朋好友可以暂住过夜的？

translation.en: [Rozick] Okay. We'll need to contact them.
translation.zh: 好的 我们需要联系他们

translation.en: We also need you to come with us to answer a few questions.
translation.zh: 我们还需要你跟我们走回答一些问题

translation.en: The driver... also died in the collision.
translation.zh: 驾驶员…也在碰撞中死亡
奥利弗 他喝醉了 对吗？

translation.en: [Garland] The cause of the accident is still being investigated.
I'm sorry. I need to use the bathroom.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我要上洗手间

translation.en: [Ty] That's why I think it makes more sense if Leah comes after.
translation.zh: 所以我觉得莉娅紧跟其后会更合理
你觉得怎么样 安珀？

translation.en: Should I go before or after Leah's juggling act?
translation.zh: 我应该在莉娅的杂耍表演之前还是之后上场？

translation.en: Uh, it's... Whatever you guys want.
translation.zh: 嗯 就是…你们想怎么样都可以
-之后挺好的-对 对 那样很好

translation.en: When a verb ends in a silent "e," drop the "e"
translation.zh: 当动词以不发音的“e”结尾把“e”去掉

translation.en: and add "ed" to form the past tense.
Aren't we going to sing, Amber?
I bet you're sick of people asking you if you're okay.
translation.zh: 我想你已经厌烦了别人问你好不好

translation.en: I went to your fancy vacation house.
translation.zh: 我去了你漂亮的度假小屋

translation.en: I had fun while she needed me.
translation.zh: 在她需要我的时候 我玩得很开心

translation.en: Then I came back, and I pushed her away.
translation.zh: 然后我回来 把她赶走了
明天去匹茨堡准备好了吗？

translation.en: Listen, I can only imagine how hard it is for you right now.
translation.zh: 听我说 我能想象你现在有多困难

translation.en: the reason you earned this opportunity,
translation.zh: 你赢得这个机会的原因

translation.en: that's still there. That doesn't go away.
translation.zh: 它依然在 没有消失

translation.en: So, the pain that you're feeling,
I think you just-- just channel it.
Channel it, put it into your song.
translation.zh: 把精力引导到你的歌曲上

translation.en: Because that's what an artist does.
translation.zh: 因为这就是艺术家应该做的
而你 你就是艺术家
谢谢 弗兰克斯老师

translation.en: You have to finish your food, you can't just stare at it.
translation.zh: 你必须把饭吃完 不能盯着它发呆

translation.en: I figured we'd leave for the airport at 7:00 a.m. the latest,
translation.zh: 我想我们最迟要七点出发去机场
也许六点半就该出发了

translation.en: And, um, you're all set up for the dorm
translation.zh: 你的宿舍已经准备好了

translation.en: and the student is gonna show you around.
translation.zh: 有学生会带你熟悉情况

translation.en: You have enough money for the cab?
Bobby has a mass on his spleen.
translation.zh: 巴比的脾脏上有个肿块

translation.en: That's what's been causing his discomfort.
But either way, the treatment is exactly the same...
translation.zh: 但不管什么情况治疗方法都是一样的

translation.en: We'll need to do surgery to remove the mass.
translation.zh: 我们需要手术切除肿块

translation.en: If that's successful, he could make a full recovery.
translation.zh: 如果手术成功 他可以完全康复

translation.en: [Amber] So that's twelve dollars an hour.
Uh, and the most I could work is a ten-hour shift?
translation.zh: 我最多能做10小时的轮班

translation.en: Okay, thank you, Lloyd. I appreciate it.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢你 劳埃德 我很感激
我又给他吃了一颗止痛片

translation.en: Well, um, I explained everything to the Admissions Office,
translation.zh: 我跟招生办公室解释过了

translation.en: I think they can get you another audition slot.
translation.zh: 我想他们可以另外安排你的试镜时间

translation.en: Amber, if it's about the plane ticket,
translation.zh: 安珀 如果是机票的问题

translation.en: -you don't have to-- -I can't audition, Donna.
translation.zh: -你不用…-我不去试镜了 唐娜

translation.en: [Ricky] Lloyd has hired Amber full-time at the donut shop.
translation.zh: 劳埃德已经雇佣安珀在甜甜圈店做全职工作

translation.en: Also, she added to her hours at the retirement home.
translation.zh: 她还增加了在养老院的工作时间

translation.en: If she works 70 hours a week at minimum wage,
translation.zh: 如果按照最低工资算她每周工作70个小时

translation.en: she could pay for Bobby's surgery in ten-and-a-half weeks.
translation.zh: 过10个半星期她可以支付巴比的手术费用

translation.en: You can't work 70 hours a week and go to school.
translation.zh: 你每周工作70个小时上学根本吃不消

translation.en: No, you can't do that, you can't throw everything away.
translation.zh: 不 你不能这样做你不能把所有事情都舍弃了

translation.en: Donna, I really appreciate everything you've done--
translation.zh: 唐娜 我真的感激你做的一切…

translation.en: It's not about that. It's about you and your future.
translation.zh: 跟这个无关有关的是你的和你的未来

translation.en: You have so much to look forward to, and so much talent. I can't let you--
translation.zh: 你有精彩的人生值得期待你那么有天赋 我不能让你…

translation.en: You can't just drop out of school.
Ty, look, I am so tired. I just can't right now.
translation.zh: 泰 听我说 我很累了现在我不想聊

translation.en: Look, I'm really sorry about Bobby.
translation.zh: 听着 巴比的事我很遗憾

translation.en: He's awesome. And I know that he's really important to you, but--
translation.zh: 他很棒 我知道他对你真的很重要 但是…

translation.en: Don't say he's just a dog.
Because he's not. Not to me.
translation.zh: 因为他不是 对我来说不是

translation.en: Let me help you. I can ask my parents.
translation.zh: 让我帮你 我去问我父母要

translation.en: -I'm handling it. -Listen to me, it can be a loan.
translation.zh: -我能处理…-听我说 就当我借给你

translation.en: Okay? You can pay them back slowly while you finish school--
translation.zh: 好吗？等你毕业了可以慢慢还

translation.en: Ty, stop! I have this under control.
translation.zh: 泰 别说了 一切都在我的控制中

translation.en: Damn it, Amber, you are so stubborn!
translation.zh: 见鬼 安珀 你太固执了

translation.en: You do so much for other people,
translation.zh: 你为其他人做了那么多

translation.en: but when you need just a little bit of help, you push us all away.
translation.zh: 但当你需要一点小小的帮助你把大家都赶走了

translation.en: What is so bad about needing help?
Like, if you don't do this on your own, you're weak?
translation.zh: 就好像你不靠自己就表示你很弱吗？

translation.en: I bet part of you is glad that you missed the audition.
translation.zh: 我打赌你内心某部分一定很高兴错过了试镜

translation.en: and you got an excuse to punish yourself for letting your mom down,
translation.zh: 你没有做到 让妈妈失望了

translation.en: You're suffering, and you won't admit it.
translation.zh: 你在受苦 你不承认

translation.en: You expect the rest of us to sit by and watch you go down the drain,
translation.zh: 你希望其他人干坐着 看着你沉沦

translation.en: I'm sorry, that must really suck, life not being fair.
translation.zh: 不好意思 那肯定很糟糕生活本来就不公平

translation.en: You know what you should do to make yourself feel better?
translation.zh: 你知道该做什么让自己好过一点吗？

translation.en: I don't know, you should hang out with your two parents at your vacation home.
translation.zh: 我不知道 你应该跟父母一道去度假屋寻欢作乐

translation.en: Maybe that'll help you get over life and its vast unfairness.
translation.zh: 也许那能帮你克服生活中的困难和巨大的不公平

translation.en: Take the rack, both sides in,
translation.zh: 拿起架子 两边都抓紧

translation.en: You know, it's a lot easier watching it this way.
translation.zh: 你知道 这么看要简单多了

translation.en: Well, my ears don't hurt from all your loud singing,
translation.zh: 你不再大声唱歌、说话讲不好笑的笑话

translation.en: In fact, if you happen to see the old Amber,
translation.zh: 实际上如果你碰巧遇见以前的那个安珀

translation.en: well, you can tell her that...
it was a living hell just being around her.
translation.zh: 和她在一起简直就是人间地狱

translation.en: All that disgusting cheer and helpfulness.
translation.zh: 所有那些令人恶心的欢声笑语和乐于助人

translation.en: You've been putting this show on for the last three years.
translation.zh: 过去三年你一直负责这个秀

translation.en: It's the last one you'll ever get to see.
I have to finish my shift.

translation.zh: 不 我们半夜才关门

translation.en: Usually, but we're out of donuts.
translation.zh: 通常是的 但我们的甜甜圈卖完了
走 跟你的朋友走吧

translation.en: Why are all those people here?
Must be really into supporting brass instruments, I guess.
translation.zh: 我想他们一定很喜欢铜管乐器

translation.en: Ty, that's way too many people for the Variety Show.
translation.zh: 泰 对于《综艺秀》来说来的人太多了

translation.en: You think it's a lot of people?
a normal amount of people. Um...
We ended up changing the proceeds to going to Bobby Big Boy's surgery.
translation.zh: 我们最后把收益用来给大巴比做手术
-什么？-我知道 对 我知道

translation.en: Look, before you-- before-- before this gets out of hand,
translation.zh: 听我说 在你…在事态失控前

translation.en: I want to say something. I want to say that I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我想说点话 我想说抱歉

translation.en: I want to say that I'm sorry about the other--
translation.zh: 我想说抱歉 关于那天…

translation.en: I was way too hard on you.
I was frustrated because I care about you...
translation.zh: 我很沮丧 因为…我在乎你…

translation.en: All of these people care about you.
They showed up for you. Okay?
translation.zh: 他们来支持你 好吗？

translation.en: So for once, you're gonna have to deal with that, all right?
translation.zh: 所以这一次你必须要克服 好吗？

translation.en: What if I don't know how?
translation.zh: 如果我不知道该怎么做呢？

translation.en: Think of it as a gift.
Okay? Think of it as a gift that you're giving us
translation.zh: 好吧 把它当成是一件你送给我们的礼物

translation.en: Have a seat, the show's about to start.
translation.zh: 请坐 演出马上开始

translation.en: Where are you going to sit?
and welcome to the "Save Bobby Big Boy" Variety Show!
translation.zh: 欢迎来到挽救大巴比综艺秀

translation.en: Now, we have some amazing acts lined up for you tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚我们为大家准备了精彩的节目

translation.en: But before we get to those, I wanted to make a few opening remarks.
translation.zh: 但在我们开始前我想先说开场白

translation.en: Amber Appleton puts together this Variety Show every year
translation.zh: 安珀·艾伯顿每年都组织这样的综艺秀

translation.en: to raise money for various school causes.
translation.zh: 为学校的各种事情筹款

translation.en: She's also helped the Drama Club mount their productions,
has lobbied the school board for better wheelchair access,
translation.zh: 游说学校董事会改善无障碍通道

translation.en: and has made me countless delicious fried-egg sandwiches.
translation.zh: 为我做了无数个美味的煎蛋三明治
她传道受业 她做志愿者

translation.en: She's... sorta like a rock star.
Just by being here tonight, she has helped me get over my...
translation.zh: 今晚我能站在这里 她已经帮我克服了我的…
我的超级超级舞台恐惧症

translation.en: Honestly, I don't know, maybe. I still might throw up, we'll see.
translation.zh: 老实说 我不知道有可能我还会吐 我们走着瞧

translation.en: even though it's really tough for her to admit,
translation.zh: 尽管她很不想承认这一点

translation.en: Our goal tonight is to raise $8,000,
translation.zh: 我们今晚的目标是筹款8000美元

translation.en: so that her dog, Bobby Big Boy, can get a life-saving operation.
translation.zh: 因此她的狗大巴比可以接受一个活命的手术

translation.en: We have raised over $2,000 in ticket sales alone so far.
translation.zh: 到目前为止光靠门票我们已经筹集了2000美元

translation.en: So, please, get out your phones
translation.zh: 所以请拿出你们的手机

translation.en: and tweet, Instagram, Facebook, live stream,
translation.zh: 在社交网站上发消息 开直播

translation.en: anything you can to help get the word out.
translation.zh: 大家努力把消息传出去

translation.en: So, let's get to our first act.
translation.zh: 现在请欣赏第一个节目

translation.en: Do you bite your thumb at me, sir.
translation.zh: 你对着我咬大拇指了吗 先生？

translation.en: I do bite my thumb, sir.
translation.zh: 我的确咬大拇指了 先生

translation.en: Do you bite your thumb at me, sir?
translation.zh: 你对着我咬大拇指了吗 先生？

translation.en: No, sir. I do not bite my thumb at you, sir, but I do bite my thumb, sir.
translation.zh: 没有 先生 我没有对着你咬大拇指先生 但我的确咬大拇指了 先生
你在挑衅吗 先生？ 挑衅 先生？

translation.en: All right, let's refresh our page and see where we are.
translation.zh: 好的 我们看一下最新数据看看我们到哪里了
（目标8000美元已筹集4833美元） 好啊 我们正朝目标迈进

translation.en: -Please, keep spreading the word. -[cheers and applause]
Next up, we have the punniest man alive.
translation.zh: 下面 我们有请世界上最会说双关语的人

translation.en: Give it up for Ricky Lingo Starr Roberts!
translation.zh: 大家掌声热烈欢迎方言之星瑞奇·罗伯茨

translation.en: I'm here to talk to you about man's best friend.
translation.zh: 我到这里要跟大家说说最好的朋友

translation.en: Well, one man's best friend. Mine.
translation.zh: 一位最好的朋友 我的朋友

translation.en: She's a human woman. Not a dog...
translation.zh: 她是人类女性 不是狗…

translation.en: but she's got a great one in Bobby Big Boy.
translation.zh: 但她有一条很棒的狗大巴比

translation.en: they got a little ruff for these two,
translation.zh: 让他们的生活有了小小的褶皱

translation.en: but we're here to give triple-B a new leash on life.
translation.zh: 但我们到这里来给予他们全新的生命引导绳

translation.en: I can say Lapso-lutely amazing things about Amber,
translation.zh: 我要说说安珀的神奇之处

translation.en: but you all might Terrier your hair out.
translation.zh: 但我们可能会吓的扯下头发

translation.en: And I don't want Amber to sit there
and Rottweiler friends Schnauzer off in front of everyone.
translation.zh: 在众人面前如罗威那和雪纳瑞那样骄傲自大 模棱两可

translation.en: So embarrassed of all the Shih Tzu here,
translation.zh: 因此让这里的所有狗屎难堪

translation.en: that she Pekingese eyes out from behind her hands.
translation.zh: 她把自己哈巴狗一样的眼睛啄出来

translation.en: I'll keep things Pug-ressing for a Spaniel be able to handle,
translation.zh: 我会像巴哥一样把舞台整理好这样后面的猎犬就能用了
然后像巡回犬一样回来

translation.en: you Mastiff known I would take this speech,
translation.zh: 你肯定知道我会上台发表这番演讲

translation.en: and Basset on the fact that you're a Great Dane...
and my best friend in the whole world.
All right, let's take another look at where we are.
translation.zh: 好的 让我们看看进展
马上就到6000美元了 好啊

translation.en: Let's keep those pledges coming in.
And now, for our last act of the night,
translation.zh: 接下来是今晚的最后一个节目

translation.en: ladies and gentlemen, the Korean Divas,
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 韩国天后

translation.en: accompanied by our very own McKinley High marching band,
translation.zh: 伴奏的是我们麦金利中学自己的仪乐队

translation.en: I don't know. Ricky said something about the "dark web."
translation.zh: 我不知道瑞奇说了一些关于“暗网”的事

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, The Korean Divas and the McKinley High Marching Band!
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 韩国天后和麦金利高中仪乐队

translation.en: Six thousand, three hundred and four dollars.
I'd like to thank all the acts, everybody who contributed.
translation.zh: 我想感谢所有的表演感谢做出贡献的每一个人

translation.en: It's been an awesome night. Thank you so, so much.
translation.zh: 美妙的夜晚 非常非常感谢

translation.en: Now, we didn't quite make our goal, but we'll keep the page open.
translation.zh: 到目前为止我们还没完成目标但我们会继续接受捐款

translation.en: So please keep spreading the word.
Everybody, our guest of honor, Amber Appleton!
translation.zh: 各位 我们的贵宾 安珀·艾伯顿
太震撼了 我还没有…

translation.en: a hundred percent sure this is happening yet.
translation.zh: 百分之百确定这一切都是真的

translation.en: But I'm so happy that the marching band got their tuba.
translation.zh: 但我非常开心仪乐队有了自己的大号

translation.en: Hope is the thing with feathers.
translation.zh: 希望是个有翅膀的东西

translation.en: We'd read it at bedtime for...
translation.zh: 我们会在睡前读这首诗…

translation.en: as long as I can remember.
even in the darkest of times.

translation.zh: 我妈妈一直都充满希望

translation.en: But you all helped me find it again.
translation.zh: 但你们一起帮我找回来了

translation.en: I don't know how to repay you.
translation.zh: 我不知道如何报答你们

translation.en: But I guess that's the point.
I don't have to repay you.
translation.zh: 我不一定非得报答你们

translation.en: I just have to take the gift that you've given me
translation.zh: 我只要拿着你们给我的礼物

translation.en: Should we take one last look at our total?
translation.zh: 我们要不要最后看一眼筹款金额？

translation.en: Um, can we get a refresh on that, please?
No. I promise you, I had nothing...
translation.zh: 没有 我向你保证 我没有…

translation.en: Looks like we got an anonymous donation of $200,000,
translation.zh: 看起来我们收到了20万的匿名捐款
让筹款总额达到了206844美元

translation.en: No, I work here on the weekends,
translation.zh: 没有 我周末在这里工作

translation.en: but I had some extra donuts, so I thought I'd stop by.
translation.zh: 但我有多余的甜甜圈所以我就顺路过来

translation.en: Oh, for God's sake, it's not a bomb. Open it.
translation.zh: 看在上帝的份上 这不是炸弹 打开

translation.en: [Joan] Told you I'd make you cry.
What am I supposed to do with all that dough, huh?
I don't have any family left.
And you can make better use of it than anyone else I know.
translation.zh: 我认识的人里面你能最大限度地利用好这笔钱

translation.en: Oh, God, no. No more waterworks. I only wanted to see it the one time.
translation.zh: 哦 天哪 不要再流眼泪了这种事情我只想看一次

translation.en: -Bye, Bobby. -♪ Feeling is all I have ♪
-♪ Find the words I need to see ♪ -You got this.
